acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

params.account: The address of the account to check
params.blockNumber: The block number to get the vote balance at

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setAccessControlManager(address).details: Admin function to set address of AccessControlManager

params.accessControlManager_: The new address of the AccessControlManager

params.chainId: The Id of the remote chain where votes are being synchronized
params.checkpoint: The number of checkpoints for the delegatee's votes
params.delegatee: The address of the delegatee whose votes are being synchronized
params.nCheckpoint: The number of checkpoints for each account
params.votes: The total number of votes to be synchronized

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner.

Unauthorized(address,address,string).notice: Thrown when the action is prohibited by AccessControlManager

ZeroAddressNotAllowed().notice: Thrown if the supplied address is a zero address where it is not allowed

NewAccessControlManager(address,address).notice: Emitted when access control manager contract address is changed

XVSVault().notice: Address of XVSVault deployed on BSC chain

accessControlManager().notice: Returns the address of the access control manager contract

checkpoints(address,uint32).notice: Total number of votes irrespect of chain id

checkpointsWithChainId(uint16,address,ui.notice: A record of votes checkpoints for each account, by chain id and index

getPriorVotes(address,uint256).notice: Determine the xvs stake balance for an account

numCheckpoints(address).notice: The number of checkpoints for each account

syncDestVotes(uint16,address,uint32,uint.notice: Synchronizes remote chain votes(amount of XVS stake) for a specific delegatee

userdoc.notice: The MultichainVoteRegistry contract is access controlled which keeps the count of the votes on the basis of chainId. This contract is responsible for providing the final accumulated voting power (on all supported chains) to the governanceDelegate contract when voting on a proposal. It is invoked by layerZero bridge receiver contract to update the vote state/checkpoint for accounts that have staked on chains apart from BSC.
